desc: Feed your hair and skin with natural and organic ingredients. Specifically designed with black with women and their melanin in mind. JéNoir caters to men who groom and take pride in skin and hair care. JeNoir has a sleek and classy look and has people asking qu'est que c'est? (What is that?) after smelling the aroma.

layout.text: Feed your hair and skin with natural and organic ingredients
